h2: Leading Life Sciences Data Management Platform
p: A cloud-based life sciences data management platform built for global pharmaceutical enterprises to streamline multi-country clinical operations. The platform centralizes data collection, regulatory tracking, and analytics across study sites.
list: End-to-End Test Automation: Developed 420+ automated test scripts across API, UI, and backend layers, increasing regression coverage by 65% and reducing manual effort by 45% per release.
Compliance-Driven Validation: Designed 180+ test scenarios aligned with 21 CFR Part 11, HIPAA, and GxP frameworks, ensuring audit readiness and traceability.
Performance and Data Accuracy Testing: Simulated concurrent user loads up to 10,000 sessions to validate system stability under production-scale volumes.
Faster Release Turnaround: Achieved 40% reduction in release validation time, enabling biweekly release cycles instead of monthly.
Improved Data Confidence: Ensured 99.8% data accuracy in system-to-system synchronization during validation cycles.
Simplified Compliance Audits: Reduced audit preparation time from 3 weeks to 5 business days, supported by automated validation documentation.

blocks.text: Leading Life Sciences Data Management Platform

A cloud-based life sciences data management platform built for global pharmaceutical enterprises to streamline multi-country clinical operations. The platform centralizes data collection, regulatory tracking, and analytics across study sites.

• End-to-End Test Automation: Developed 420+ automated test scripts across API, UI, and backend layers, increasing regression coverage by 65% and reducing manual effort by 45% per release.
• Compliance-Driven Validation: Designed 180+ test scenarios aligned with 21 CFR Part 11, HIPAA, and GxP frameworks, ensuring audit readiness and traceability.
• Performance and Data Accuracy Testing: Simulated concurrent user loads up to 10,000 sessions to validate system stability under production-scale volumes.

• Faster Release Turnaround: Achieved 40% reduction in release validation time, enabling biweekly release cycles instead of monthly.
• Improved Data Confidence: Ensured 99.8% data accuracy in system-to-system synchronization during validation cycles.
• Simplified Compliance Audits: Reduced audit preparation time from 3 weeks to 5 business days, supported by automated validation documentation.

h2: Clinical Trial Automation and Monitoring Platform
p: A digital clinical trial management platform built to help CROs and pharma sponsors manage multi-phase studies, real-time site monitoring, and patient safety reporting across multiple geographies.
list: Automated Regression and Validation: Implemented automation covering 14 core modules and 75 business-critical workflows, achieving 70% automation coverage in under 8 weeks.
Integration Testing Across Ecosystem: Verified seamless interoperability among EDC, CTMS, and Safety systems using mock and live API environments 4 ensuring 100% data consistency across integrations.
Risk-Based Testing Approach: Adopted a hybrid validation model prioritizing high-risk modules, optimizing QA effort by 35% without reducing test depth.
Accelerated UAT Sign-offs: Reduced UAT cycle time from 12 days to 7 days, improving overall release cadence.
Zero Critical Defects in Production: Achieved a defect leakage rate below 0.3% post-release.
Enhanced Sponsor Confidence: Helped the client secure three additional clinical partnerships through improved platform reliability and audit readiness.

blocks.text: Clinical Trial Automation and Monitoring Platform
A digital clinical trial management platform built to help CROs and pharma sponsors manage multi-phase studies, real-time site monitoring, and patient safety reporting across multiple geographies.

• Automated Regression and Validation: Implemented automation covering 14 core modules and 75 business-critical workflows, achieving 70% automation coverage in under 8 weeks.
• Integration Testing Across Ecosystem: Verified seamless interoperability among EDC, CTMS, and Safety systems using mock and live API environments 4 ensuring 100% data consistency across integrations.
• Risk-Based Testing Approach: Adopted a hybrid validation model prioritizing high-risk modules, optimizing QA effort by 35% without reducing test depth.

• Accelerated UAT Sign-offs: Reduced UAT cycle time from 12 days to 7 days, improving overall release cadence.
• Zero Critical Defects in Production: Achieved a defect leakage rate below 0.3% post-release.
• Enhanced Sponsor Confidence: Helped the client secure three additional clinical partnerships through improved platform reliability and audit readiness.
